mapper.sql: a.concretetyp_code AS "concretetypCode", a.concretetyp_name AS "concretetypName", a.stock_name AS "stockName", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_concretetyp a
AND a.concretetyp_code LIKE '%'||#{concretetypCode}||'%' '%'+#{concretetypCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{concretetypCode}, '%')
AND a.concretetyp_name LIKE '%'||#{concretetypName}||'%' '%'+#{concretetypName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{concretetypName}, '%')
AND a.stock_name LIKE '%'||#{stockName}||'%' '%'+#{stockName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{stockName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_concretetyp( concretetyp_code, concretetyp_name, stock_name, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{concretetypCode}, #{concretetypName}, #{stockName}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_concretetyp SET concretetyp_code = #{concretetypCode}, concretetyp_name = #{concretetypName}, stock_name = #{stockName}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
